: : Rodimus Prime : :
Rodimus hears Yggdrasil over the comm, but at first he has no intention of listening. However the mention of his daughter makes him stop in his tracks.
Rodimus collapses on the battlefield, his comm channel open.
Rodimus Prime: I k..know Yggdrasil, but I h..have t..to help her. I c..cant leave her there. S..shes my family. I l..love h..her...
Rodimus had been reduced to an emotinal wreck by this point. Anger, hatred, love, loss, it was all to much for him. At this time Rodimus didn't seem like the strong Autobot and Maximal Commander, but more of a scared and confused child.
 Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:Yggdrasil had heard the message, but he could not obey. Besides, he
was as high ranking as Rodimus.

Yggdrasil: All right that does it! Kup, I'm going after Rodimus.
There's no way he'll end like my cousin...

He runs out of the base and opens a frequency directed at Rodimus.

Yggdrasil: Rodimus, stop where you are or I swear I'm going to beat
you bad. You still have a daughter to take care of, for Prime's sake!

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> Rodimus ducked for cover as Carnation's shots struck near by.
> Rodimus Prime: We all must die someday Galvatron. You can run but
your day is here!
> Rodimus Prime could not help but see the irony of what he and Hydras
had just said. They had reversed roles. Rodimus' mind drifts back.
> -Flashback-
> Within the belly of Unicron, the sounds of battle can be heard. It
is dark as Galvatron stalks around, looking for his prey.
> Galvatron: Come out Autobot, we all must die someday.
> Rodimus, as Hot Rod, sneaks up behind Galvatron. Galvatron turns
just in time to see his opponent before he strikes.
> Hot Rod: Not today, Galvatron!
> Hot Rod sends a strong right into Galvatron's face, knocking him
from his feet.
> Hot Rod transformes, driving away.
> -End flashback-
> Rodimus opens a comm on the Maxinal frequency.
> Rodimus Prime: Maximals, this is the commander. Do not persue them
in their retreat. They are trying to lead us into their defences.
> Rodimus knew enough as commander to warn his troops but his anger
over Nightlight blinded him to it. He gets up and chases after Hydras.
He starts to repeatedly shoot at the Predacon leader.

<P><STRONG>: : Rodimus Prime : :</STRONG>
<P>Rodimus hears Yggdrasil over the comm, but at first he has no intention of listening. However the mention of his daughter makes him stop in his tracks.
<P>Rodimus collapses on the battlefield, his comm channel open.
<P><STRONG>Rodimus Prime: </STRONG>I k..know Yggdrasil, but I h..have t..to help her. I c..cant leave her there. S..shes my family. I l..love h..her...
<P>Rodimus had been reduced to an emotinal wreck by this point. Anger, hatred, love, loss, it was all to much for him. At this time Rodimus didn't seem like the strong Autobot and Maximal Commander, but more of a scared and confused child.
